description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
distance to starting point in meters
number of days the food location was approached and successfully depleted
number of days the food location was approached
relative percentage calculated by the number of days where the food location was approached and successfully depleted/the number of experimental days
relative percentage calculated by the number of days where the food location was approached/the number of experimental days
